# trame-gantt

Widget for gantt editor for trame

# Licence

  - Apache License, Version 2.0, (LICENSE-APACHE or https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)

at your option. 

# Development

Build and install the Vue components

```console
cd  vue-components
npm i
npm run build
cd -
```

Install the python library
```console
pip install -e .
```
